# Support

## Getting Help

- **Documentation:** Check the [docs/](../docs) folder
- **Discussions:** Use [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/domelic/github-repository-setup/discussions)
- **Issues:** For bugs and feature requests only

## Before Opening an Issue

1. Search existing issues to avoid duplicates
2. Check the documentation
3. Provide clear reproduction steps

## What to Include

When opening an issue, please provide:

- Clear description of the problem or request
- Steps to reproduce (for bugs)
- Expected vs actual behavior
- Screenshots if applicable

## Response Times

This is maintained in spare time. Please be patient with responses.
